name: Mitigation Playbook for Exploitation via Malicious Scripts
description: This playbook mitigates an incident where an attacker has gained network access through vulnerable web applications, executed malicious scripts, modified files, and exfiltrated data.

parallel--8c9e0b10-151f-4c9c-81f1-ed7a56.name: Immediate Mitigations
parallel--8c9e0b10-151f-4c9c-81f1-ed7a56.description: Terminate suspicious processes and isolate compromised hosts simultaneously.

action--a9d678fc-6358-4dea-91ae-2b03d715.name: Terminate suspicious process immediately
action--a9d678fc-6358-4dea-91ae-2b03d715.description: Kill any processes running suspicious behavior.

action--b2e3cd68-e8e4-427b-9b8e-65dbddf7.name: Isolate compromised hosts from the network
action--b2e3cd68-e8e4-427b-9b8e-65dbddf7.description: Disconnect compromised hosts from the network to prevent further unauthorized access.

commands.command: if [[ $(hostname) == "host-101" || $(hostname) == "host-102" ]]; then nmcli device disconnect; fi

action--cd017b6e-0da1-4e4c-b4b4-b04b826e.name: Scan system for malware signatures
action--cd017b6e-0da1-4e4c-b4b4-b04b826e.description: Perform ongoing scans to ensure the system is free of malware.

commands.command: echo Scan system for malware signatures:  Perform ongoing scans to ensure the system is free of malware.
